column1: Homeowners' Association for New Single-Family Houses Completed1
(Components may not add to totals because of rounding.  Percents computed from unrounded figures.)
RSE/SE - Relative Standard Error (percent), Standard Error (percentage points)
A - Represents an RSE that is greater or equal to 100 percent or could not be computed
Z - Less than 500 units or less than 0.5 percent
S - Withheld because estimate did not meet publication standards on the basis of response rate
1 Includes houses built for rent (not shown separately).
